Columns.Description: The Universal Time Coordinated (UTC) time when the request was received by storage.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: The name of the storage account.
Columns.Name: AccountName

Columns.Description: The location of storage account.
Columns.Name: Location

Columns.Description: The protocol that is used in the operation.
Columns.Name: Protocol

Columns.Description: The type of REST operation that was performed.
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: The type of authentication that was used to make the request.
Columns.Name: AuthenticationType

Columns.Description: The HTTP status code for the request. If the request is interrupted, this value might be set to Unknown.
Columns.Name: StatusCode

Columns.Description: The status of the requested operation.
Columns.Name: StatusText

Columns.Description: The total time, expressed in milliseconds, to perform the requested operation. This includes the time to read the incoming request, and to send the response to the requester.
Columns.Name: DurationMs

Columns.Description: The total time expressed in milliseconds to perform the requested operation. This value doesn't include network latency (the time to read the incoming request and send the response to the requester).
Columns.Name: ServerLatencyMs

Columns.Description: Uniform resource identifier that is requested.
Columns.Name: Uri

Columns.Description: The IP address of the requester, including the port number.
Columns.Name: CallerIpAddress

Columns.Description: The ID that is used to correlate logs across resources.
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: The schema version of the log.
Columns.Name: SchemaVersion

Columns.Description: The storage service version that was specified when the request was made. This is equivalent to the value of the x-ms-version header.
Columns.Name: OperationVersion

Columns.Description: The hash of authentication token.
Columns.Name: AuthenticationHash

Columns.Description: The OAuth object ID of the requester.
Columns.Name: RequesterObjectId

Columns.Description: The OAuth tenant ID of identity.
Columns.Name: RequesterTenantId

Columns.Description: The Open Authorization (OAuth) application ID that is used as the requester.
Columns.Name: RequesterAppId

Columns.Description: The OAuth audience of the request.
Columns.Name: RequesterAudience

Columns.Description: The OAuth token issuer.
Columns.Name: RequesterTokenIssuer

Columns.Description: The User Principal Names of requestor.
Columns.Name: RequesterUpn

Columns.Description: Detailed policy information used to authorize the request.
Columns.Name: AuthorizationDetails

Columns.Description: The User-Agent header value, in quotes.
Columns.Name: UserAgentHeader

Columns.Description: The Referer header value.
Columns.Name: ReferrerHeader

Columns.Description: The x-ms-client-request-id header value of the request.
Columns.Name: ClientRequestId

Columns.Description: The ETag identifier for the returned object, in quotes.
Columns.Name: Etag

Columns.Description: The service associated with this request.
Columns.Name: ServiceType

Columns.Description: The number of each logged operation that is involved in the request. This count starts with an index of 0. Some requests require more than one operation, such as a request to copy a blob. Most requests perform only one operation.
Columns.Name: OperationCount

Columns.Description: The size of the request header expressed in bytes. If a request is unsuccessful, this value might be empty.
Columns.Name: RequestHeaderSize

Columns.Description: The size of the request packets, expressed in bytes, that are read by the storage service. If a request is unsuccessful, this value might be empty.
Columns.Name: RequestBodySize

Columns.Description: The size of the response header expressed in bytes. If a request is unsuccessful, this value might be empty.
Columns.Name: ResponseHeaderSize

Columns.Description: The size of the response packets written by the storage service, in bytes. If a request is unsuccessful, this value may be empty.
Columns.Name: ResponseBodySize

Columns.Description: The value of either the Content-MD5 header or the x-ms-content-md5 header in the request. The MD5 hash value specified in this field represents the content in the request.
Columns.Name: RequestMd5

Columns.Description: The value of the MD5 hash calculated by the storage service.
Columns.Name: ResponseMd5

Columns.Description: The Last Modified Time (LMT) for the returned object. This field is empty for operations that can return multiple objects.
Columns.Name: LastModifiedTime

Columns.Description: A semicolon-separated list of key-value pairs that represent a condition.
Columns.Name: ConditionsUsed

Columns.Description: The value of the Content-Length header for the request sent to the storage service.
Columns.Name: ContentLengthHeader

Columns.Description: The category of requested operation.
Columns.Name: Category

Columns.Description: The TLS version used in the connection of request.
Columns.Name: TlsVersion

Columns.Description: Records any violations in the request SAS token as per the SAS policy set in the storage account. Ex: longer SAS token duration specified than allowed per SAS policy
Columns.Name: SasExpiryStatus

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
